overview: What if there was a place where you could get it hot and ready anytime whenever you wanted? Come on down to the Raging Stallion 'Drive Thru'. We serve immediate gratification to satisfy even the hungriest appetite. Always giving it to you YOUR way! Every which way! Double the meat, protein style and loaded with special sauce just soaking through the bag! Grease it up and cum inside' the 'Drive Thru' is always open. Or drive up to the service window, our young and hung meat men are equipped to serve you. Whether you're looking for an Extra Thick Hot Dog or a simple Tossed Salad, this menu and staff have it all. Raging Stallion director Steve Cruz takes you to the 'Drive Thru' with his horny meat slingers who are more than willing to go the extra mile for customer service.
tagline: You just might get lucky with some extra special meat between your buns.
title: Drive Thru
